asserts.localErrorMessage: IF [Transport mode at border] = '1' or '8' THEN [Identity of means of transport crossing border] consists either of the International Maritime Organisation (IMO) ship identification number or of the European Vessel Identification Number (ENI)
asserts.errorMessage: If 'Transport Mode at Border' = '1' or '8' Then 'Identity of means of transport crossing border' consists either of the International Maritime organisation (IMO) ship identification number (format n7 – leading '0' allowed) OR of the European Vessel Identification Number (ENI) (format n8 – leading '0' allowed) (C514)
